tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vpn_connection_logs (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  connect_time TIMESTAMP,
  disconnect_time TIMESTAMP,
  ip_address VARCHAR(15),
  status VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE vpn_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  connection_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  client_ip VARCHAR(15),
  server_ip VARCHAR(15),
  vpn_server_port INT,
  vpn_protocol VARCHAR(10),
  connection_duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE security_incidents (
  incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  log_id INT,
  incident_type VARCHAR(50),
  investigation_status VARCHAR(20),
  incident_description TEXT,
  response_action TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE vpn_connections (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    connection_time TIMESTAMP,
    disconnect_time TIMESTAMP,
    vpn_server VARCHAR(50),
    connection_status VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE security_incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    description TEXT,
    severity VARCHAR(10),
    incident_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE vpn_users (
 user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
 password VARCHAR(100),
 last_login TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE vpn_connections (
 connection_id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
 user_id UUID REFERENCES vpn_users(user_id),
 connection_time TIMESTAMP,
 server_ip VARCHAR(20),
 client_ip VARCHAR(20),
 connection_duration INTERVAL,
 success BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE vpn_servers (
 server_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 server_name VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
 server_ip VARCHAR(20) UNIQUE
)

CREATE TABLE security_incidents (
 incident_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 connection_id UUID REFERENCES vpn_connections(connection_id),
 incident_type VARCHAR(50),
 incident_description TEXT,
 incident_date TIMESTAMP,
 incident_resolved BOOLEAN
)
CREATE TABLE vpn_user (user_id INT, username VARCHAR(50), connection_time TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE vpn_server (server_id INT, server_name VARCHAR(50), location VARCHAR(50), server_ip VARCHAR(15)
CREATE TABLE vpn_connection_log (log_id INT, user_id INT, server_id INT, connection_start TIMESTAMP, connection_end TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE vpn_alerts (alert_id INT, log_id INT, alert_type VARCHAR(50), alert_description TEXT)
CREATE TABLE vpn_incidents (incident_id INT, log_id INT, incident_type VARCHAR(50), incident_description TEXT)
